overview: A documentary like no other. Starting with the bizarre practices and fantasies of a group of filmmakers working under the label Experimental Film Society, it spins off into a manifesto of light and sound. This dazzling journey through a view of cinema as cosmic ritual and erotic delirium is also an idiosyncratic celebration of the medium itself. Rouzbeh Rashidiâ€™s ornate visual style unleashes a parade of visionary scenes that redefine movie magic as a fevered hallucination.
title: Luminous Void: Docudrama
